scripts.test:local: cross-env DD_API_KEY=123456 TEST_ENV=local npm run test
scripts.test: cross-env-shell "artillery run -e \$TEST_ENV --config ./tests/config.yml ./tests/scenarios/register-search-users.yml -o reports/register-search-users.json && artillery report -o reports/register-search-users.html reports/register-search-users.json"
